approveOrder_(address[7],uint256[9],uint.details: Call approveOrder - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

approvedOrders(bytes32).details: Determine if an order has been approved. Note that the order may not still be valid in cases where the maker's nonce has been incremented.
approvedOrders(bytes32).return: whether or not the order was approved.

atomicMatch_(address[14],uint256[18],uin.details: Call atomicMatch - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

calculateCurrentPrice_(address[7],uint25.details: Call calculateCurrentPrice - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

calculateFinalPrice(uint8,uint8,uint256,.details: Call calculateFinalPrice - library function exposed for testing.

calculateMatchPrice_(address[14],uint256.details: Call calculateMatchPrice - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

cancelOrderWithNonce_(address[7],uint256.details: Call cancelOrder, supplying a specific nonce — enables cancelling orders that were signed with nonces greater than the current nonce.

cancelOrder_(address[7],uint256[9],uint8.details: Call cancelOrder - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

changeMinimumMakerProtocolFee(uint256).details: Change the minimum maker fee paid to the protocol (owner only)

params.newMinimumMakerProtocolFee: New fee to set in basis points

changeMinimumTakerProtocolFee(uint256).details: Change the minimum taker fee paid to the protocol (owner only)

params.newMinimumTakerProtocolFee: New fee to set in basis points

changeProtocolFeeRecipient(address).details: Change the protocol fee recipient (owner only)

guardedArrayReplace(bytes,bytes,bytes).details: Call guardedArrayReplace - library function exposed for testing.

hashOrder_(address[7],uint256[9],uint8,u.details: Call hashOrder - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

hashToSign_(address[7],uint256[9],uint8,.details: Call hashToSign - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

orderCalldataCanMatch(bytes,bytes,bytes,.details: Return whether or not two orders' calldata specifications can match
orderCalldataCanMatch(bytes,bytes,bytes,.return: Whether the orders' calldata can be matched

ordersCanMatch_(address[14],uint256[18],.details: Call ordersCanMatch - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

staticCall(address,bytes,bytes).details: Execute a STATICCALL (introduced with Ethereum Metropolis, non-state-modifying external call)

params.extradata: Base data for STATICCALL (probably function selector and argument encoding)

staticCall(address,bytes,bytes).return: The result of the call (success or failure)

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

validateOrderParameters_(address[7],uint.details: Call validateOrderParameters - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

validateOrder_(address[7],uint256[9],uin.details: Call validateOrder - Solidity ABI encoding limitation workaround, hopefully temporary.

incrementNonce().notice: Increment a particular maker's nonce, thereby invalidating all orders that were not signed with the original nonce.
